colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD DBUL BA'I TSUL 'DI NI JANG JONG CHEN PO WANG GI MNGA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAM DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG @007A *, ,LDAN PA MYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG GSO RTZE GYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA DIM TSE BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG PHYIR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN BZHIN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO SLOB DPON MA THA SHAL PA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUS PAS CHOG MI MTHONG ZHING, BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYI TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YE SHES KYIS 'GRO NAS BRIS PA 'DI LA, LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYIS SKYON THAMS CAD LHA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, ,)
